prompt:
Patient: Hello?

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Jerri Reynolds?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming. Could you please provide your date of birth for verification purposes?

Patient: February fourth nineteen fifty four.

responses.gpt4: Great, thank you for confirming your date of birth, Mr. Reynolds. I'm giving you a call today regarding your upcoming colonoscopy. Is this a suitable time to chat? And by the way, how has your day been so far?
responses.our_model: Thank you for confirming your date of birth, Mr. Reynolds. I'm calling about your upcoming colonoscopy on August 13th at 9:00 AM. Is this a good time to talk?
